story.Text: STEP 1: Hi! We are going for a treasure hunt. In this challenge we are going to add a new device to the robot. So let's get started...
Step 2: First of all check whether you have plugged the base module to the main module. You should be able to see 'Wheels' module under 'I Have' column.
STEP 3: Now we have to plug the new device. So plug the sonar module on top of the main module.
STEP 4: Bird needs to go forward first. Drag and drop 'Go Forward' block.
STEP 5: Now the bird has to travel until it sees an object. So let's drag and drop 'See Object' block next to 'Until'.
STEP 6: Now the bird has to turn right to see the treasure. So let's drag and drop 'Turn Right' block.
Congratulations!!! You have completed Challenge - 4 successfully!
